body:
I tried to use spack to install xsdk had some issues and then used spack clean xsdk .
Now I keep getting the error message
==> Error: YAML ProviderIndex was not a dict.
even after uninstalling and reinstalling spack.
Anybody know what is going on, and how I can get rid of this problem?
Thanks
Ulrike
title: ==> Error: YAML ProviderIndex was not a dict.
